summary: The module defines a mapping‑style class that exposes MAPDL parameters and system settings as a mutable dictionary, handling scalar, string and array values, synchronizing changes with the MAPDL session, and providing utilities for parsing parameter listings and temporarily enabling full parameter output.
business_intent: Enable programmatic inspection and manipulation of ANSYS MAPDL parameters to support automated simulation workflows, custom scripting, and advanced post‑processing.
